mapper.sql: USER_ID, USERNAME, NAME , PASSWORD, DT_CREATE, LAST_LOGIN, DEADLINE, LOGIN_IP, V_QZJGID, V_QZJGMC, DEP_ID, DEP_NAME, ENABLED, ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED, ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED, CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USERS ( USERNAME, NAME, PASSWORD, DT_CREATE, LAST_LOGIN, DEADLINE, LOGIN_IP, V_QZJGID, V_QZJGMC, DEP_ID, DEP_NAME, ENABLED, ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED, ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED, CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vQzjgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vQzjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accountNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accountNonLocked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{credentialsNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update SYS_USERS
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DT_CREATE = #{dtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
V_QZJGID = #{vQzjgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
V_QZJGMC = #{vQzjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEP_ID = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEP_NAME = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED = #{accountNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED = #{accountNonLocked,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED = #{credentialsNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_USERS set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_CREATE = #{dtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, V_QZJGID = #{vQzjgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, V_QZJGMC = #{vQzjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEP_ID = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEP_NAME = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED = #{accountNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED = #{accountNonLocked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED = #{credentialsNonExpired,jdbcType=TINYINT} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT SYS_USERS.USER_ID, SYS_USERS.USERNAME , SYS_USERS.NAME miniName, SYS_USERS.PASSWORD , SYS_USERS.ENABLED, SYS_USERS.ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED, SYS_USERS.ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED, SYS_USERS.CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED FROM SYS_USERS WHERE SYS_USERS.USERNAME = #{username}
